org.streaminer.stream.classifier.tree

Class HoeffdingTreeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streaminer.stream.classifier.tree.HoeffdingTreeModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, DescriptionModel<String>, Model, PredictionModel<Data,Serializable>

    public class HoeffdingTreeModel
extends Object
implements PredictionModel<Data,Serializable>, DescriptionModel<String>
    Represents a Hoeffding Tree. The type of the nodes in this tree is HoeffdingTreeNode
    Author:
    Tobias Beckers
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HoeffdingTreeModel(Map<String,Class<?>> featureTypes, Serializable label)
      Creates a new Hoeffding Tree containing only an empty root with an initial label.
      Defines a type for each feature.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String describe()
      Returns a string representation of the current tree
      HoeffdingTreeNode getLeaf(Data example)
      Returns the leaf at which the path through the tree ends for the specified Example.
      Class<?> getType(String feature)
      Returns the FeatureType for the specified feature
      Serializable predict(Data example)
      Returns the predicted class label for the specified example

      Returns a string representation of the current tree

      • HoeffdingTreeModel

        public HoeffdingTreeModel(Map<String,Class<?>> featureTypes,
                  Serializable label)
        Creates a new Hoeffding Tree containing only an empty root with an initial label.
        Defines a type for each feature.
        Parameters:
        featureTypes - a declaration of types for all features
        label - an initial Label for the root
